RangeStatistic.name: FileDescriptors
RangeStatistic.description: The number of file descriptors allocated by the server process.

RangeStatistic.name: VmSize
RangeStatistic.description: Virtual memory size of the process.

RangeStatistic.name: VmRSS
RangeStatistic.description: Resident set size, i.e. the number of bytes the process has in real memory.
